scripts.start:test: docker-compose -p test-e2e -f docker-compose.test.yml run --rm e2e; exitcode=$?; docker-compose -p test-e2e -f docker-compose.test.yml down; exit ${exitcode}
scripts.build:recette: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.recette.yml build && rm -rf images-docker && mkdir images-docker && docker save -o ./images-docker/nginx_recette nginx_recette:latest && docker save -o ./images-docker/api_recette api_recette:latest
